ROW.PDT: *IF ( ( *VALUE Managers.MQ_Manager_Status *NE Active *AND *VALUE Local_Time.Day_Of_Week *NE Sunday ) *OR ( *VALUE Managers.MQ_Manager_Status *NE Active *AND *VALUE Local_Time.Day_Of_Week *EQ Sunday *AND *VALUE Local_Time.Hours *GT 10 ) )

ROW.MAP: <situation name="ITMP_MQ_QMgr_Not_Active_adv" ><class name="ITM_Managers" /><slot slotName="appl_label" ><mappedAttributeValue name="Managers.MQ_Manager_Name" /></slot><slot slotName="msg" ><literalString value="ITM--MQ Queue Manager $Managers.MQ_Manager_Name$ Has A Status Of $Managers.MQ_Manager_Status$ On $Managers.Host_Name$" /></slot><slot slotName="msg_catalog" ><literalString value="noshow" /></slot><slot slotName="NotifyAction" ><literalString value="11" /></slot><slot slotName="NotifyCategory" ><literalString value="2" /></slot><slot slotName="NotifyEmailGroup" ><literalString value="username@email.com" /></slot></situation>
